title: Beans with beef in tomato sauce (fasouliah)

ingredients.content: 300 g beef shoulder meat, cut into pieces (3-4 cm)

preparations.content: Soak overnight dried white beans in 700 g water with 1 tsp baking soda.
Place onions and oil into mixing bowl, chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>, add beef, salt and pepper and sauté <b>10 min/120°C/speed <b>.
<b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>, add water and heat <b>10 min/100°C/speed <b>.

Add drained and washed pre-soaked beans and tomato puree, cook <b>50-70 min/100°C//speed <b>, prolong time if white beans are not soft enough (see tip). Transfer into a serving bowl and season to taste before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Cooking time of beans in step 6 varies depending on the quality of the beans.
